synopsis.text: House bound siblings Jack and Annie stumble upon an enchanted tree house while pursuing a weasel, unaware of the extraordinary adventures that await them. The tree house, brimming with magical books, serves as a portal to various eras and destinations. The duo embarks on a daunting quest to gather four elusive medallions scattered across time and space, all in a bid to aid a sorceress named Morgan. This captivating anime is inspired by the award-winning children's book series, The Magic Tree House, penned by renowned American author Mary Pope Osborne.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
